item.title: Segmenting with Mixed Type Data - A Case Study Using K-Medoids on Subscription Data
item.description: With the new year, I started to look for new employment opportunities and even managed to land a handful of final stage interviews before it all grounded to a halt following the corona-virus pandemic. Invariably, as part of the selection process I was asked to analyse a set of data and compile a number of data driven-recommendations to present in my final meeting. In this post I retrace the steps I took for one of the take home analysis I was tasked with and revisit clustering, one of my favourite analytic methods.
